title: Problem previewing component data with Blazor Client Authentication
body:
I am using Blazor WebAssembly for a test application with individual user authentication based on the basic project(Index/Counter/FetchData/...). FetchData component needs for the user to get authorized. If i start the application and go to my custom component (Customer.razor) i get the result of pic1(label returns without value). When i refresh the page, i get the result of pic2(blazor page disappears and i get the value as sole json). Do you guys have a suggestion or solution to this problem? I have Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly 3.2.1.

Thank you in advance
